welcome_message_body: Welcome to Wakefield, where history and charm meet in this beautiful city known for its stunning architecture, vibrant arts scene, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your time here and explore all that Wakefield has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport serves both domestic and international flights.
